headline: Should Equifax’s (EFX) Free AI Credit Planner Shape Views on Its Data and Innovation Strategy?
summary: In February 2026, Equifax announced that it had begun offering Optimal Path, its AI-powered interactive credit score planner, free to U.S. consumers through the myEquifax mobile app, providing personalized 30-day action plans tied to each user’s Equifax credit profile. This move underscores how Equifax is using its cloud-native platform and patented EFX.AI technology to deepen direct consumer engagement with more tailored, behavior-based credit tools. Next, we’ll examine how embedding...
